data.title: Anime Blu Ray/DVD- Buy, Sell or Trade thread
data.meta_description:
By request, an extension of the general movies trade thread.


Same rules as that one.


"In this thread, each CAG has one post  slot. You maintain your...
data.text:
Getting rid of a large part of my collection

Want:

paypal payments

(blu-ray unless otherwise noted)

Full metal panic Season 1 .

The world god only knows seasons 1 and 2

Tiger and Bunny,

Infinite Stratos

Dream Eater Merry,

Fractale,

Tokyo Magnitude 8.0

Shakugan no shana season 1 (I might want more if I like it)

Sakura Wars TV series (dvd)

Certain Magical Index collections (dvd)

Marmalade boy (dvd)

have:

3x3 eyes complete collection

.hack/legend of the twilight bracelet

A.D. Police ( former Blockbuster rental, discs are fine, a few very minor scratches, the case is a rental case)

Adventures of the mini-goddess (former rental but from an actual anime store, the dvds are immaculate, the cases are the original ones, as well)

Ai yori aoshi (this is the original pioneer release, with all of the original extras, no box, just the dvds)

Angel Tales (I know this is cheap ass gamer, so I'm willing to negotiate on this one, but don't be a dick)

Angelic Layer (this breaks my heart to a small extent, because I freaking love this anime, but I've not watched it in a very long time so I don't see a lot of point in holding on to it)

Arc the Lad collection (the digipak, first ed. I think) - wow, um, wow, available for trade because apparently it's worth crap on amazon, and ebay.

Azumanga daioh - unlikely I will sell this unless someone offers me a great price, this is the big box, not the later released mini one, with all six dvds, I bought it as it came out.

Beck Mongolian Chop Squad (it's the first mini-collection from funi, three mini-cases in a slipcover)

Berserk (this is the original box that opens like a I don't know what the word is http://en.wikipedia...._Box_of_War.jpg that, but it also includes all 6 discs)

Bleach season 1 collection, dvds are fine, box has some wear

Boys Be - another may not sell, who knows

Bubblegum crisis tokyo 2040 - it's the original first print digipak from ADV

Cardcaptor sakura - Probably not for sale, but if you make me a really good offer, I'll sell em both of the book collections, and the movies

All Purpose Cat Girl Nuku Nuku Tv, and Dash ADV thinpack collections

Chobits dvd collection (thinpack collection from pioneer)

Comic Party - (the original box set from rightstuf full size dvd cases)

D.N. Angel (original thin pack from adv)

Dual Parallel Trouble Adventures (no box just the individual dvds)

Eat Man 98 - trade because apparently it's worth crap for crap

El Hazard the alternative world set no box, just separate dvd cases

El Hazard Wanderers tv series box set (with outer box original pioneer release)

Ex Driver OVA collection - (former rental, disc is fine with minor scuffs, blockbuster case)

Familiar of Zero Collection - WTF how is this worth this much? Check amazon and half to see what I mean (packed in one case release from pioneer, geneon whatever)

Flaming Rectum, I mean Flame of Recca (some have never even been opened, that's how pristine this is, actually only volume 1 has been, we watched it from netflix, never got around to watching it

Full Metal Panic First Season collection, I have two different versions of this. The first is the version that ADV first produced for a complete collection mostly dark blue with thin cases, and the second is the bright red one with Kaname plastered on the side.

FLCL, the three individual dvd releases from Synch point, sold as a set -(no box )

Cyberformula GPX (may hold onto for when bandai stuff goes MORE out of print)

Galaxy Angels - I have the original digipak set, A, AA, and Z

Gatekeepers, and Gatekeepers 21

Geobreeders 1 & 2 - no box just the dvds in their cases

Ghost Stories - I don't think any of you want to spend how much this is apparently worth, but it is for sale. Yes, it is the ADV series with the crazy dub. -

Giant Robo - (not the giant eye box, wish I had bought it, the economy pack)

Goldenboy - never been watched, I can't bring myself to watch it again (saw it at an anime club years before), even if the dub is hilarious

Hanaukyo Maid team - (not box set, individual release dvds)

Heroic Legend of Arislan -

Infinite Ryvius - (the collection in the original release box, not extra items, sorry)

Kaleido Star, and new wings - the original thin pack release form ADV of both

Key the metal idol - (since vol 3 seems to be rare, I'm trying to make my money back on these, bought them when VIz first released them, the individual dvds, not the box set)

King of Bandits Jing - (includes the four discs and the OVA, not a box set the individual dvds, sorry flaked on getting the box for them)

Kodocha - hmm may hold onto that especially since we haven't finished the dvds, but make an offer

Love Hina complete series - ( tv series comes in the box from the individual dvd release, and the two specials/movies and ova are separate dvds. )

Lost universe - (thinpack collection from Rightstuf)

Magical Project S - Complete series, (don't mock me, because I like bizarre anime)

Maburaho - (complete thinpack colletion from ADV)

Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha - pack of thin dvd cases from geneon

Mahoromatic - (3 disc sets individual for each season, pioneer release) season 1 2 and summer special

Martian successor nadesico the original digipak release from ADV -

Magic Users club - (individual dvd release, no box set)

Maze of the HAZE - (tv series, excellent condition, still has outer box)

Mermaid Forest - (complete series in a nice box, everything is pretty)

Mobile Suit Gundam Wing - (brick box/digpak whatever), season 1 2 and endless waltz

Mobile Suit Gundam 08th MS team (the all in one dvd case thing)

Niea Under 7 - (all four dvds, individual release)

Omishi Magical Theater Risky Safety - (individual dvd release, no box set)

Outlaw Star - (complete digipak, I think it's called)

Pani Poni Dash - (if you want to buy it, this is not the funi re-release this is the original ADV release with the 6 dvds in the box.)

Petit Princess Yucie (yet another I'm not sure why I bought, the thinpack collection from ADV)

Please teacher and twins - (the digipak release from bandai, may not sell)

Read or die tv and ova - individual dvds, not box sets

Record of lodoss war - (may not sell though, pretty attached to it)

Samurai Deeper Kyo - (economy box set)

Rumiko Takahashi Anthology box

Rurouni kenshin economy collections 1, 2, and 3

Saber Marionette J Ultimate Edition- (may not sell like FY, since they were the first two anime I ever saw subbed way back in the VHS days when bandai was called Animevillage (I think))

Saikano - (the complete collection as a 2 disc set release from viz)

Sailor Moon Super S - Only sailor moon collection I have left, not the box set the individual dvds. you know you want it, chibijosh

Saiyuki - (the complete thin-pack release that had all 10 discs of the first tv series, god, the ADV dub was a billion times better than the pioneer/geneon one)

School Rumble -

Sister Princess - (the first thinpack release from ADV in the purple box

Someday's dreamer - three individual dvds, pioneer release, (you get a discount if you can spell it's japanese name without cheating and any romanji spelling errors)

Soul Hunter - (sorry but this is wayyyy out of print, don't believe the liars on amazon on it being that cheap, this is in the same condition I bought it 6 or 7 years ago, maybe 10, original brick release from ADV)

Spiral - (original dvd collection release from funimation)

Tokyo Undergound -(warning this is the UK release, to watch it, you'll need a region free dvd player or a computer able to do so, madman entertainment complete set release)

Trouble Chocolate - all 5 volumes

Tsubasa season 1 dvd - (PM me)

Tenshi ni narumon dvd 1

Twin Signal -

Ultramaniac - I'm not likely going to sell, it but for the right price, I'll consider, complete series in the big box set release

X/1999 set with outer box (no sleeves)

Something something something Gaogaigar - Both are the premium box releases -

S-cry-ed - (this is the release of the complete collection that was in the trapezoidal box with the keychain, if I can't find the keychain, I'll knock off $10)

Okay, I swear that's all of it

Getting rid of a large part of my collection

Want:

paypal payments

amazon GC (well, really I might take most payments EXCEPT iTunes, and I won't take XBL cards either)

The world god only knows seasons 1 and 2

Tiger and Bunny (set 2 only please),

Dream Eater Merry,

Fractale,

Tokyo Magnitude 8.0

Robotics; notes vol. 2
